version_description:
What's new?

Fiat withdrawal
Now you can withdraw USD, UAH, RUB through a mobile application. Available methods: Visa / Mastercard, Qiwi, AdvCash, Payeer, Perfect Money

New design for the withdrawal process for crypto
Fully redesigned crypto withdrawal process. Now it has become even clearer, simpler and clearer.

Crete deposit in a new design
Now, with each deposit of the crypt, we display a reminder that deposits without a Memo / Destination tag will not be credited. And then very often lashes turn to us with the wording “I forgot to specify a memo ... how to be?” To prevent this from happening, we’ll remind you once again how to replenish the stock exchange balance correctly :) Well, in general, it has become more beautiful and more comfortable. The “Share” button also performs well.

USDT deposit and withdrawal via OMNI and ERC20 protocols
It doesn’t matter if you use the OMNI or ERC20 protocol, you can bring USDT to the exchange from any wallet and also withdraw to any USDT wallet.

Bugs, fixes, improvements
1. Deposits through Qiwi, the course is now correctly calculated.
2. Now the phrase “Unknown error” has become less frequent, if there is an error - we have come up with a human description for it.
3. Added a deposit method from any card (Visa / Mastercard Worldwide)
4. Introduce masks for wallets
5. Refinement of the UAH withdrawal process via Qiwi
6. Add info blog in VISA World
7. In withdrawal methods - if I choose Kuna, the code for some reason throws me at activation code. although due on creation. Even when I call back, I get to the page of my codes, but I must go to the page for choosing the output method.
8. Refinement of the process of replenishing FIAT currencies, namely setting up the sorting of replenishment methods
9. Fixed incorrect calculation of the commission when displaying the minimum amount.
10. Added validation for the field "card number" when saving VIsa cards
11. When creating a new card for Visa to display, display an alert that the “Card Name” field is mandatory
12. Finalize the output of FIAT currencies, add the ability to save cards for withdrawal using Visa for rubles
13. Bugs version 1.3 (86)
14. Changes in the layout of screens for the process of replenishing the crypt

Kuna is the best and most reliable place to buy and sell your cryptocurrency.
In this release, we introduced:
- new analytics

Kuna is the best and most reliable place to buy and sell your cryptocurrency.
In this release, we introduced:
- new market feature
- fixed bug on orders history page
